results.description: Super League champions St Helens will host NRL winners Sydney Roosters in the 2020 World Club Challenge in February.
results.shortTitle: Saints to host Roosters in February
results.title: World Club Challenge 2020: St Helens to host Sydney Roosters on 22 February

results.description: George Williams, Jake Trueman, Joe Philbin and Zak Hardaker join GB's squad for Saturday's final tour game against Papua New Guinea.
results.shortTitle: Bennett adds four to 21-man Lions squad
results.title: Great Britain Lions: Wayne Bennett adds four to 21-man squad v Papua New Guinea

thumbnail.altText: Great Britain Rugby League Lions head coach Wayne Bennett

results.description: England and Great Britain boss Wayne Bennett's future cannot just be judged on the 2019 Lions tour, says RFL chief Kevin Sinfield.
results.shortTitle: 'Lions just one factor in Bennett decision'
results.title: Wayne Bennett: England & GB coach's future judged on several factors, says Kevin Sinfield

results.description: Wakefield Trinity sign Widnes forward Brad Walker on a two-year deal, but he will be loaned to Newcastle Thunder in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Wakefield sign Walker from Widnes
results.title: Brad Walker: Wakefield Trinity sign Widnes Vikings loose forward

results.description: Greece will make their debut at the 2021 Rugby League World Cup in England - despite domestic turmoil - after thrashing Serbia 82-6 in Belgrade.
results.shortTitle: Greece qualify for Rugby League World Cup
results.title: Greece qualify for Rugby League World Cup for the first time

results.description: Great Britain boss Wayne Bennett says the England-heavy squad has shown signs of "going backwards" since 2018.
results.shortTitle: Bennett says squad has 'gone backwards'
results.title: Great Britain Rugby League Lions: Wayne Bennett says squad has gone 'backwards'

results.description: Captain Emily Rudge scored four tries as England Women beat Papua New Guinea 24-10 in their first Test in Goroka.
results.shortTitle: Rudge scores four as England beat PNG
results.title: Papua New Guinea 10-24 England: Emily Rudge scores four tries

results.description: Watch highlights as Great Britain suffer a heavy 23-8 defeat by New Zealand in the third match of the Lions tour in Christchurch.
results.shortTitle: New Zealand defeat Great Britain 23-8 in third Lions tour match
results.title: Highlights: New Zealand 23-8 Great Britain Lions

results.description: Great Britain fall to their third straight tour defeat, losing 23-8 to New Zealand in Christchurch.
results.shortTitle: Kiwis inflict third tour loss on GB Lions
results.title: New Zealand 23-8 Great Britain Rugby League Lions: Kiwis inflict third tour defeat

results.description: Wigan Warriors sign forward Kai Pearce-Paul from relegated London Broncos on a four-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Wigan sign Broncos' Pearce-Paul
results.title: Kai Pearce-Paul: Wigan Warriors sign London Broncos academy forward

results.description: Huddersfield Giants and Warrington Wolves are to join an expanded 10-team Women's Super League next season.

results.title: New Zealand 23-8 Great Britain Rugby League Lions: Relive the action as it happened

results.description: Zak Hardaker and Joe Philbin are ruled out as Great Britain's tour of New Zealand and Papua New Guinea hits an injury crisis.

results.title: New Zealand v Great Britain Lions: Hardaker and Philbin out as tourists' injury list grows

results.description: Amid all the hype of Toronto signing Sonny Bill Williams, Great Britain have a Test series to save against the Kiwis.

results.description: Second rower John Bateman the only British player included in the shortlist for the 2019 Golden Boot award.

results.title: John Bateman: Great Britain second rower named on Golden Boot shortlist

results.description: Scrum-half Jordan Williams signs a contract with London Broncos, leaving capital neighbours London Skolars.

results.title: Jordan Williams: London Broncos signs scrum-half from Skolars

results.description: England will play the final Test of next year's Ashes series against Australia at Tottenham Hotspur's new stadium.

results.title: Tottenham Hotspur Stadium to host final England v Australia Ashes test in 2020

results.description: Leeds wing Ash Handley is called up to the Great Britain squad for their final tour game in Papua New Guinea.
